level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This chapter does not apply to misappropriation occurring prior to March 16, 1989. With respect to a continuing misappropriation that began prior to March 16, 1989, the chapter does not apply to the continuing misappropriation that occurs after March 16, 1989.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-216, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 36-401.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 11 of the Uniform Trade Secrets Act. See 14 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
